participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, she often reflects deeply on her experiences and values.
participant_1.background: I value my time the most because it is the only thing that can never be replaced. I want to be more patient with my partner. Since my new job is physically demanding, I try to go for a walk every day. i am on a low carb diet. My parents are very supportive of my art, even though they don't understand it.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and humorous, he enjoys sharing moments of joy with his pet and values his solitude.
participant_2.background: I love having my dog around because he always makes me laugh. I'm a solitary type and my favorite animal is the cat. i have one older sister named mary. I will miss my parents a lot since they moved to Florida. I once got to see one of my favorite bands in concert.

content.text: Hi there!  How are you doing today?
Heya, I'm doing good! How are you today?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm trying to stay busy with my new job and hobbies.
That's good to hear! I'm looking forward to starting my new job soon.
Oh nice! What kind of work will you be doing?
I'll be working as a customer service representative.
Oh that's cool! I used to work in customer service and it was a lot of fun.
I'm glad to hear that! I'm a little nervous but I'm excited to get started.
I'm sure you'll do great! What are some of your hobbies?
I love to read, play video games, and spend time with my dog.
Oh nice! I love reading and playing video games too. What kind of games do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different types of games, but my favorite genre is probably RPGs.
Oh nice! I love RPGs too. I've been playing a lot of Skyrim and Witcher 3 lately.
Those are both great games! I've been playing a lot of Final Fantasy XV lately.
Oh nice! I've heard good things about that game.
